rukus.text: Vy budete zauvazhyty Kontaktnu Molytvu (Salat) koly znyzhennya sontsya z yoho nayvyshchoho vkazuyutʹ na poludenʹ, yak tse rukhy do zakhodu sontsya. Vy budete takozh zauvazhyty (recitation) Quran u svitanku. (Deklamuyuchy) Quran u svitanku zasvidchuyetʹsya
Protyahom nochi, vy budete rozdumuvaty dlya dodatkovoho kredytu, shcho vash Lord mozhe pidnyaty vas do pochesnoho rozryadu
Ta kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, prypuskayutʹ meni pochesne dopushchennya, ta dozvolene meni vid'yizhdzhayutʹ pochesnyy vid'yizd, ta harantuyutʹ meni vid Vas potuzhna pidtrymka
Proholoshuyutʹ, pravda perevazhala, ta falsehood znykla; falsehood inevitably znyknutʹ
My posylayemo vnyz u Quran likuyuche ta myloserdya dlya viruyuchiv. Odnochasno, tse tilʹky zbilʹshuye wickedness porushnykiv
Koly my blahoslovlyayemo lyudsʹkyy buduchy, vin staye preoccupied ta neuvazhnyy. Ale koly neshchastya vrazhaye yoho, vin povertaye despondent
Kazhutʹ, "Kozhnyy pratsyuye z·hidno z yoho viroyu, ta vash Lord znaye krashchi kotryy keruyutʹsya u pravi shlyakh
